headline: Ford held talks with China's Xiaomi over EV partnership, FT reports
summary: Jan 31 () - Ford has held talks with electric-vehicle maker Xiaomi about forming a joint venture to manufacture ​EVs in the U., the Financial Times reported on ‌Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline: Ford Energy Launch Ties New Storage Push To Ford Valuation Debate
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) is creating a new battery energy storage business, Ford Energy. Lisa Drake has been appointed president of Ford Energy to lead this expansion into battery energy storage systems. Ford Motor, ticker NYSE:F, is adding a new line of business with the launch of Ford Energy, focused on battery energy storage systems. This move puts Ford directly into the battery energy storage system, or BESS, space, which sits alongside its existing work in electric vehicles and batteries...

headline: If You'd Invested $100 in Ford 5 Years Ago, Here's How Much You'd Have Today
summary: The stock's monster gain in 2025 was out of the ordinary for the Detroit carmaker.

headline: Minivan sales surge 21% in 2025 as millennial dads lead demand for cars offering the 'best bang for your buck'
summary: Most carmakers are only focused on the truck and SUV buyer, but one model saw a surge in popularity last year — the trusty family minivan.
